attributes.action: introduce legislation to stop the Director General of the BBC using the term 'earn' in relation to the money which is paid to contract holders with the BBC.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To 'earn' is an adjective.  BBC employees are 'paid' regardless of the levels of achievement, or criminal activity which results in the BBC Licence Taxpayer being required to pay their fines, therefore to say they 'earn' what they are paid is a gross misrepresentation of what is actually going on.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
